name: Alabama Smith in Escape from Pompeii
name_original: Alabama Smith in Escape from Pompeii
description:
Alabama Smith in Escape from Pompeii is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Alawar Stargaze. It came out on 01-09-2011. It was published by Alawar Entertainment. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Alabama Smith in Escape from Pompeii is available on PC.
